sentences.english: In this paper, p-methylphenyl sulphonylamine was used to modify urea formaldehyde resin with low molar ratio.
sentences.chinese: 用对甲基苯磺酰胺改性低克分子比的脲醛树脂。

sentences.english: This paper describes intensity property of joined timber with urea-formaldehyde resin.
sentences.chinese: 本文描述了脲醛树脂胶指接材的强度性能。

sentences.english: Urea-formaldehyde adhesive with free formaldehyde content lower than 0.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了脲醛胶粘剂的合成新工艺。

sentences.english: BL-formaldehyde absorptive reagent is used to solve the formaldehyde emission problem of wood-based panels.
sentences.chinese: 甲醛消纳剂用于解决脲醛胶人造板的甲醛释放问题。

sentences.english: The catalysts and process conditions for the synthesis of urea- formaldehyde resin were studied.
sentences.chinese: 对合成脲醛树脂的催化剂及工艺条件进行了研究。

sentences.english: The paper states the ways of reducing the poison of urea-formaldehyde and extending its storing time.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了降低脲醛树脂毒性，并延长其贮存期的方法。

sentences.english: A kind of modified low toxic urea-formaldehyde resin was synthesized.
sentences.chinese: 经过大量试验合成了一种低毒改性脲醛树脂。

sentences.english: The production of two kinds of wood-based panel UF resin synthesis technology were discussed.
sentences.chinese: 论述了人造板生产中两种脲醛树脂合成工艺。

definition: phenolic aldehyde/phenolic resin (used to manufacture bakelite)
